Westminster.King Arthur Carrousel: King Arthur Carrousel is a carousel attraction located in Fantasyland at Disneyland in Anaheim, California. Originally built in 1875, the carousel operated at Sunnyside Beach Park in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, from 1922 onwards. The ride was later relocated to Disneyland, where it was refurbished and modified by Arrow Development, and opened with the park on July 17, 1955.
